title: cant find my mystery skin
body:
hi guys... i just got my mystery skin but i closed the box to fast and i dint saw what it was, was looking into my champs but i cant find it, is there any way i can do that faster???
ive checked on skins but i only find the ones i have from before, maybe i got an skin that is not for sale??

replies.body: I think you can see it under gifting history.

Yup! 

Store -> Purchases -> View My Gifting History should show you what you received! :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=nVK5IgLn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-06T15:09:47.817+0000)
>
> Yup! 
> 
> Store -> Purchases -> View My Gifting History should show you what you received! :]

Mine doesn't.
I got {{champion:68}} from it, but it doesn't show in gift history. Unsure if I'm alone in that or it just worked that way with mystery gift from Riot.
I know in the past when I was gifted skins/mystery skins from friends it showed up there though.
Oh, that's odd. That's how it worked for the good behavior rewards last season. I can ask around to see if that's the case for this event.

I think another way is go to Profile>Champions>Availability>Recently Purchased.
Mine's always been a bit wonky..as in, it'll show any champs I've gotten recently, any champs I've gotten skins for recently, and a couple random champs I have no clue why they pop up there.
But it should eliminate it down from 120+ to 4 or so. You should know which of you already owned before.
